attributes.action: Give Posthumous Knighthoods to Bill Nicholson, Brian Clough and Herbert Chapman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As posthumous decorations are now being requested for Bob Paisley and Jock Stein, there are other football managers who deserve recognition. It would be unfair to respond only to supporters of Glasgow Celtic & Liverpool FC, when there are other managers who have historic achievements that are worthy of similar recognition.

rejection.details: We are no longer accepting petitions calling for posthumous honours, as this is not possible under the honour rules. See www.honours.gov.uk/faqs.aspx
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
